reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I wanted in a camera!
reviews.reviewText: I have been delighted with this camera! It was so easy to utilize all of the functions and the video and photos are wonderful, my friends are so impressed! It's a beautiful camera and the photos are sharp. I hardly need to edit pictures at all, they are usually so perfect. I'm still exploring all I can do with it and take many pictures a day. Everything's been so easy, even downloading the photos to my computer and Nikon is so supportive and provided me with a website to download pictures. It's just been a joy! Thank you so much for such a wonderful camera at a reasonable price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST CAMERA,PROFESSIONAL QUALITY, GREAT PRICE!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this before a big Hockey game that I was attending. I love hockey and taking sports pictures and this camera does that beautifully!Also I use this for my own modeling purposes. I set it on a tripod and put it on the self timer and it take gorgeous model professional looking photos!! I LOVE IT!!! I did however drop it while ice skating and the lens has a bad scratch on it, but that was my fault BUT it still works and takes good photos the bottom corner is just a bit blurry now. ALSO I suggest buying rechargable batteries. I bought a 4 pack of double A's that recharge for $20 on here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good camera
reviews.reviewText: The zoom feature is great but the focus is eluding me. The manual isn't much help and have found answers on YouTube. Same day shipping - not - was shipped two days later and two day Amazon Prime was 5 days. There is an obvious learning curve for this type of camera but once we get through that I think we'll like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent point and shoot
reviews.reviewText: Positives:This is a pretty good little camera, a bargain for the price. The camera body is reasonably small and has a great optical zoom range - that is its best feature (tied with the plum body color, if you ask my wife). As with any camera, skip the digital zoom - you may as well keep the entire image and crop later as you see fit.The image stabilization on videos was a pleasant surprise. Camera movements are effectively eased into, causing them to smooth out without distorting the video or causing unnatural motion like with some video site's more aggressive software stabilization. It does not remove movement to produce a perfectly still shot, nor should it - get a tripod or a camera stabilizer if that is what you need. However, the results are quite good and feel rather natural and relaxed.I have not had a chance to test the high speed video.Negatives:The camera is slow...that is to be expected at this price point, but it does border on frustrating at crucial, time sensitive moments.I have yet to figure out how to reliably get the camera to focus on the correct object. I may be overlooking a setting somewhere.The flash does not have an auto-release in low-light situations or at least an on-screen indicator for the user that a flash is suggested - that would have been a nice touch.Technically, 16MP is good by today's standards - but because of the small sensor used, the images it takes are not terribly crisp at full resolution. This is not uncommon - but you should expect the 16MP image to record a very good 8MP image or an excellent 4MP image.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing camera for the price!
reviews.reviewText: The camera arrived on time. This item is billed as refurbished but arrived looking brand new. The picture quality is excellent and the zoom is amazing. The clarity from two miles away was amazing once I figured out you need to hold the shoot button halfway until the picture clarifies.I would recommend this camera for anyone looking for a high quality camera for personal use. Excellent value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The camera was well maintained, but half a dozen ...
reviews.reviewText: The camera was well maintained, but half a dozen uses later, I experienced the infamous battery exhausted message. The 10 decent pictures I took were not worth the price of this camera. Now I am without a camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2016
reviews.reviewText: It worked well briefly, but now after a few uses you have to replace the batteries. It doesn't hold a charge at all. You take a couple pictures and it's dead. Horrible product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After some prodding she went ahead and used it and found it to be the best camera the agency has had in years
reviews.reviewText: It took us a while to getting around to opening and using this camera. At first the user was a little apprehensive about how well it would work because it is refurbished. After some prodding she went ahead and used it and found it to be the best camera the agency has had in years! It is easy to use and maintain and takes great pictures whether it be from prints to uploading on the internet. Glad we decided to keep it.
